targets.expr:
(sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(rate(container_network_receive_packets_total{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (pod))

panels.title: Average Container Bandwidth by Pod: Received

* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (pod))
